isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - BE 200, CE 200, CE 300 Model - ELECTRICAL SYSTEM CONTROLLER AND SWITCH PACKS - ELECTRICAL SYSTEM CONTROLLER - ESC REPLACEMENT

svcproc.title: ESC REPLACEMENT

note.para: When an ESC malfunction is suspected, reloading the ESC programming is recommended prior to replacement. There is a chance the programming may have been corrupted. The "ICAP" software must be used to download the configuration file from IC Corporation. Refer to the "ICAP" users manual. The "ICAP" software can then be used to reload the configuration file to the ESC. If the malfunction is present after reprogramming, replace the ESC. The "ICAP" software must be used to load the configuration file to the replacement ESC.

step1.para: Remove the kick panel at the side of the drivers right which covers the ESC inside the cab.
Remove all electrical connections to the ESC.
Remove the four nuts that secure the ESC to the dash panel.
Remove the ESC from the inside of the cab.

svcproc.para: Install the new ESC by reversing these steps. The new ESC must be loaded with the configuration file from IC Corporation. Refer to the "ICAP" programming software manual.

note.para: When replacing the ESC, replace with an IC Corporation BE/CE Bus ESC. International Truck and Bus and IC Corporation RE/FE Bus ESC's are NOT compatible with the IC Corporation BE/CE Bus
